entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued August 31 at 12:25PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PDT FRIDAY... The Oregon Department of Environmental Quality and Southwest Clean Air Agency have issued an Air Quality Advisory for Multnomah and Clark Counties, which is in effect until midday Friday. Smoke associated with the Camp Creek Fire near Mount Hood will cause air quality to reach unhealthy levels at times through midday Friday.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 4:13AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...ELEVATED FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS ON TODAY... ...NEAR-CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS SUNDAY...
